title: Spatio-Temporal Gap Analysis of OBIS-SEAMAP Project Data
summary: This paper summarizes all datasets published on OBIS-SEAMAP up to February 2009, focusing on their spatial and temporal aspects, with seabirds comprising the majority of records.
usefulness_reason: Score 70 assigned because the title explicitly mentions 'Spatio-Temporal' and 'Data', and the content refers to 'datasets' being summarized spatially and temporally, which is relevant to spatio-temporal analysis and contextual/survey data.
